title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. You can move them around, but they don't have any effect. This behavior is observed even when opening a small image, like an icon, making the scrollbars misleading because they don't do anything.
